original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.51. Sanidassanattika, Nahetusahetukaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu🔽nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha🔽…pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika na hetu sa hetuka duka  anidassana appaṭigham na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu  na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha  pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Triad-Couplet Section of the Conditions

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
